# stevescargall.com

> Exploring the intersection of technology, creativity, and artificial intelligence through insightful blog posts, tutorials, publications, and innovative projects focused on cutting-edge topics like Linux, CXL (Compute Express Link), high-performance computing (HPC), and advanced AI concepts such as AI, context engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), generative AI, and large language models (LLMs).

Steve Scargall shares unique perspectives on technology trends, creative explorations, and practical how-to guides. The site showcases a blend of thought leadership, hands-on tutorials, published works, and inventive projects involving Linux systems, and hardware-software co-design. Emphasizing open source principles and innovations in memory hierarchy, memory coherency protocols, and system software architecture. The content also delves into responsible AI practices, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, explainable AI, and the latest advances in multimodal AI and AI safety. These resources provide valuable insights for tech enthusiasts and professionals working in computing, software development, AI innovation, and hardware design.
